verses.verse: These<WH428> are now the chief<WH7218> of their fathers,<WH1> and this<WH428> is the genealogy<WH3188> of them that went<WH5927> up with me from Babylon,<WH894> in the reign<WH4438> of Artaxerxes<WH783> the king.<WH4428>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Phinehas;<WH6372> Gershom:<WH1648> of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar;<WH385> Daniel:<WH1840> of the sons<WH1121> of David;<WH1732> Hattush.<WH2407>

Of the sons<WH1121> of Shechaniah,<WH7935> of the sons<WH1121> of Pharosh;<WH6551> Zechariah:<WH2148> and with him were reckoned<WH3187> by genealogy<WH3188> of the males<WH2145> an hundred<WH3967> and fifty.<WH2572>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Pahathmoab;<WH6355> Elihoenai<WH454> the son<WH1121> of Zerahiah,<WH2228> and with him two hundred<WH3967> males.<WH2145>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Shechaniah;<WH7935> the son<WH1121> of Jahaziel,<WH3166> and with him three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> males.<WH2145>
Of the sons<WH1121> also of Adin;<WH5720> Ebed<WH5651> the son<WH1121> of Jonathan,<WH3083> and with him fifty<WH2572> males.<WH2145>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Elam;<WH5867> Jeshaiah<WH3470> the son<WH1121> of Athaliah,<WH6271> and with him seventy<WH7657> males.<WH2145>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Shephatiah;<WH8203> Zebadiah<WH2069> the son<WH1121> of Michael,<WH4317> and with him fourscore<WH8084> males.<WH2145>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Joab;<WH3097> Obadiah<WH5662> the son<WH1121> of Jehiel,<WH3171> and with him two hundred<WH3967> and eighteen<WH8083> <WH6240> males.<WH2145>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Shelomith;<WH8019> the son<WH1121> of Josiphiah,<WH3131> and with him an hundred<WH3967> and three score<WH8346> males.<WH2145>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Bebai;<WH893> Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Bebai,<WH893> and with him twenty<WH6242> and eight<WH8083> males.<WH2145>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Azgad;<WH5803> Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Hakkatan,<WH6997> and with him an hundred<WH3967> and ten<WH6235> males.<WH2145>

And of the last<WH314> sons<WH1121> of Adonikam,<WH140> whose<WH834> names<WH8034> are these,<WH428> Eliphelet,<WH467> Jeiel,<WH3273> and Shemaiah,<WH8098> and with them three score<WH8346> males.<WH2145>
Of the sons<WH1121> also of Bigvai;<WH902> Uthai,<WH5793> and Zabbud,<WH2072> and with them seventy<WH7657> males.<WH2145>

And I gathered<WH6908> them together to the river<WH5104> that runs<WH935> to Ahava;<WH163> and there<WH8033> stayed<WH2583> we in tents<WH2583> three<WH7969> days:<WH3117> and I viewed<WH995> the people,<WH5971> and the priests,<WH3548> and found<WH4672> there<WH8033> none<WH3808> of the sons<WH1121> of Levi.<WH3878>

Then sent<WH7971> I for Eliezer,<WH461> for Ariel,<WH740> for Shemaiah,<WH8098> and for Elnathan,<WH494> and for Jarib,<WH3402> and for Elnathan,<WH494> and for Nathan,<WH5416> and for Zechariah,<WH2148> and for Meshullam,<WH4918> chief<WH7218> men;<WH1400> also for Joiarib,<WH3114> and for Elnathan,<WH494> men<WH1400> of understanding.<WH995>

And I sent<WH6680> them with commandment<WH3318> to Iddo<WH112> the chief<WH7218> at the place<WH4725> Casiphia,<WH3703> and I told<WH7760> <WH6310> them what<WH1697> they should say<WH1696> to Iddo,<WH112> and to his brothers<WH251> the Nethinims,<WH5411> at the place<WH4725> Casiphia,<WH3703> that they should bring<WH935> to us ministers<WH8334> for the house<WH1004> of our God.<WH430>

And by the good<WH2896> hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> on us they brought<WH935> us a man<WH376> of understanding,<WH7922> of the sons<WH1121> of Mahli,<WH4249> the son<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> the son<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and Sherebiah,<WH8274> with his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> eighteen;<WH8083>
And Hashabiah,<WH2811> and with him Jeshaiah<WH3470> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> his brothers<WH251> and their sons,<WH1121> twenty;<WH6242>

Also of the Nethinims,<WH5411> whom David<WH1732> and the princes<WH8269> had appointed<WH5414> for the service<WH5656> of the Levites,<WH3881> two hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> Nethinims:<WH5411> all<WH3605> of them were expressed by name.<WH8034>

Then I proclaimed<WH7121> a fast<WH6685> there,<WH8033> at<WH5921> the river<WH5104> of Ahava,<WH163> that we might afflict<WH6031> ourselves before<WH6440> our God,<WH430> to seek<WH1245> of him a right<WH3477> way<WH1870> for us, and for our little<WH2945> ones, and for all<WH3605> our substance.<WH7399>

For I was ashamed<WH954> to require<WH7592> of the king<WH4428> a band<WH2428> of soldiers<WH2428> and horsemen<WH6571> to help<WH5826> us against the enemy<WH341> in the way:<WH1870> because<WH3588> we had spoken<WH559> to the king,<WH4428> saying,<WH559> The hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> is on all<WH3605> them for good<WH2896> that seek<WH1245> him; but his power<WH5797> and his wrath<WH639> is against<WH5921> all<WH3605> them that forsake<WH5800> him.
So we fasted<WH6684> and sought<WH1245> our God<WH430> for this:<WH2063> and he was entreated<WH6279> of us.
Then I separated<WH914> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> of the chief<WH8269> of the priests,<WH3548> Sherebiah,<WH8274> Hashabiah,<WH2811> and ten<WH6235> of their brothers<WH251> with them,

And weighed<WH8254> to them the silver,<WH3701> and the gold,<WH2091> and the vessels,<WH3627> even the offering<WH8641> of the house<WH1004> of our God,<WH430> which the king,<WH4428> and his counsellors,<WH3289> and his lords,<WH8269> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> there present,<WH4672> had offered:<WH7311>

I even weighed<WH8254> to their hand<WH3027> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> talents<WH3603> of silver,<WH3701> and silver<WH3701> vessels<WH3627> an hundred<WH3967> talents,<WH3603> and of gold<WH2091> an hundred<WH3967> talents;<WH3603>
Also twenty<WH6242> basins<WH3713> of gold,<WH2091> of a thousand<WH505> drams;<WH150> and two<WH8147> vessels<WH3627> of fine<WH6668> copper,<WH5178> precious<WH2530> as gold.<WH2091>

And I said<WH559> to them, You are holy<WH6944> to the LORD;<WH3068> the vessels<WH3627> are holy<WH6944> also; and the silver<WH3701> and the gold<WH2091> are a freewill<WH5071> offering to the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers.<WH1>

Watch<WH8245> you, and keep<WH8104> them, until<WH5704> you weigh<WH8254> them before<WH6440> the chief<WH8269> of the priests<WH3548> and the Levites,<WH3881> and chief<WH8269> of the fathers<WH1> of Israel,<WH3478> at Jerusalem,<WH3389> in the chambers<WH3957> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD.<WH3068>

So took<WH6901> the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> the weight<WH4948> of the silver,<WH3701> and the gold,<WH2091> and the vessels,<WH3627> to bring<WH935> them to Jerusalem<WH3389> to the house<WH1004> of our God.<WH430>

Then we departed<WH5265> from the river<WH5104> of Ahava<WH163> on the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> day of the first<WH7223> month,<WH2320> to go<WH3212> to Jerusalem:<WH3389> and the hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> was on us, and he delivered<WH5337> us from the hand<WH3709> of the enemy,<WH341> and of such as lay in wait<WH693> by the way.<WH1870>
And we came<WH935> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> and stayed<WH3427> there<WH8033> three<WH7969> days.<WH3117>

Now on the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> was the silver<WH3701> and the gold<WH2091> and the vessels<WH3627> weighed<WH8254> in the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430> by the hand<WH3027> of Meremoth<WH4822> the son<WH1121> of Uriah<WH223> the priest;<WH3548> and with him was Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Phinehas;<WH6372> and with them was Jozabad<WH3107> the son<WH1121> of Jeshua,<WH3443> and Noadiah<WH5129> the son<WH1121> of Binnui,<WH1131> Levites;<WH3881>
By number<WH4557> and by weight<WH4948> of every<WH3605> one: and all<WH3605> the weight<WH4948> was written<WH3789> at that time.<WH6256>

Also the children<WH1121> of those that had been carried<WH1473> away,<WH1473> which were come<WH935> out of the captivity,<WH7628> offered<WH7126> burnt<WH5930> offerings to the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> bullocks<WH6499> for all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> ninety<WH8673> and six<WH8337> rams,<WH352> seventy<WH7657> and seven<WH7651> lambs,<WH3532> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> he goats<WH6842> for a sin<WH2408> offering: all<WH3605> this was a burnt<WH5930> offering to the LORD.<WH3068>

And they delivered<WH5414> the king's<WH4428> commissions<WH1881> to the king's<WH4428> lieutenants,<WH323> and to the governors<WH6346> on this side<WH5676> the river:<WH5104> and they furthered<WH5375> the people,<WH5971> and the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
